Details

HtmlStyleTag - this is a subclass of StyleTag that provides different rendering depending on whether the interpreter is in HTML mode or not. In HTML mode, we display our htmlOpenText and htmlCloseText; when not in HTML mode, we display our plainOpenText and plainCloseText. `class `**`HtmlStyleTag`**` :   `[`StyleTag`](../object/StyleTag.html)
